```{r}

library(sugaRbag)

library(tidyverse)
library(purrr)
library(sf)
library(viridis)
library(ggthemes)
library(plotly)
library(geofacet)
```


```{r}

load(system.file("data","sa2_2011.Rda", package = "sugaRbag"))
load(system.file("data","capital_cities.Rda", package = "sugaRbag"))
load(system.file("data","fortified_qld_3.Rda", package = "sugaRbag"))

SIR_Downloadable_Data <- read_csv("data/atlas-data/SIR Downloadable Data.csv")

fortified_SIR <- left_join(fortified_qld_3, qld_sfc)

```



```{r}
ggplot(data=fortified_qld_3) +
    geom_hex(aes(x = hex_long, y = hex_lat, fill=SA4_NAME11,
        label = SA2_NAME11), position = "identity", stat = "identity") +
    geom_polygon(aes(x=long,y=lat,order=order,group=group), colour = "grey", fill = NA) +
    scale_fill_viridis_d() +
    guides(fill = FALSE) +
    theme(aspect.ratio = 1)


```
